name: Y2K Warriors
description:
UH OH! you're a SUPER COOL radical HUMAN KID in the 1990s, and an EVIL AI  wants to TAKE OVER the WORLD on Y2K! the only way to stop it? the powers of FRIENDSHIP, COOLNESS, and INCREDIBLE VIOLENCE! and remember, kids, WINNERS DONT DO DRUGS!

[this game is super in development! as of right now basically nothing has been implemented. just bask in the 90s energy for now, dudes. ]
